name: Luna Snow

abilities.name: Ice Shard / Heal Pulse
abilities.damage: Dark Ice: 50 per shard / Light Ice: Heal 30 (Ally) or 15 (Self) pulse
abilities.details: Dark Mode fires ice shards. Light Mode emits healing pulses.

abilities.name: Ice Slide / Frozen Ground
abilities.damage: Dark Ice: N/A (Movement) / Light Ice: 15 damage + Slow AoE
abilities.details: Dark Mode performs an icy slide. Light Mode creates a slowing ice patch on the ground.

abilities.name: Mode Switch
abilities.details: Switches between Dark Ice (Damage focus) and Light Ice (Healing/Support focus).

ultimate.name: K-Pop Performance
ultimate.damage: Dark Ice: 250 AoE Damage + Freeze / Light Ice: 300 AoE Heal + Cleanse
ultimate.effect: Unleashes a powerful performance. Dark Mode damages and freezes enemies. Light Mode heals allies and removes debuffs.
ultimate.details: Combines cryokinesis and stage presence for a major effect based on current mode.

passives.name: Cryokinesis
passives.details: Dark Ice shards apply a stacking 'Chill' effect, slowing enemies. Light Ice pulses grant allies minor speed boost.

teamups.effect: Mode Switch cooldown is slightly reduced.

lore: Seol Hee, a South Korean K-pop idol who gained cryokinetic powers after an incident involving a Stark Industries cold fusion experiment. She uses her powers for both performing and heroism.

comics.title: War of the Realms: New Agents of Atlas
